item.title: Docs: Troubleshooting
item.description:
Rate Limiting

Any call can receive an HTTP 429 Too Many Requests response, caused by sending too many requests to a particular Onshape endpoint in a given time window. Depending on the endpoint, the number of requests and time window vary and are subject to change. Onshape does not publish this information. If your client receives HTTP 429 responses, reduce its request rate.
